Title: SharePoint HTML5 - Pictures Box
Description: This is a web part control to display a matrix of image thumbnails made with JavaScript, HTML5 & JSON, loaded from a picture SharePoint library for interactive
HomeWiki:
**SHAREPOINT PICTURES BOX**

This is a webpart control to display a matrix of image thumbnails. For a build a Metro IDE or a Picture Gallery to show products, news, or a social team with your integrants pictures, etc. All this, from any SharePoint picture library.


**FEATURES OF THE WEBPART** ver. 1.0

- The matrix presentation is set automatically by the dimensions of the webpart and by the number of pictures list ítems
- Rendering via JSON, you can load a lot of images faster and asynchronously
- Use CSS3 and HTML5 tags to present and anímate the thumbnails with visual effects
- Compatible with SharePoint online / Office 365 via sand box
- Compatible with SharePoint 2010 (Require modify simple master page) / 2013
- When you make clic over the image thumbnails you can redirect to the big size picture or any other link via OpenTo column (You can made a calculated column to open especial custom link or other behavior that you can need)
- The tooltip of the picture is the title of your list item.
